author: baxter30
title: Blockchain Learning Center
description: 人们需要获得有关区块链技术的高质量信息。有趣的平易近人的学习方式很难找到。

f6_assessments.q0: 该提案团队打算开设一个实体办公室/地点，由训练有素和值得信赖的社区成员培训所有希望加入Cardano的区块链爱好者。目前要求的56400美元资金是在大卫-巴克斯特创立的小组的投资之上，https://www.linkedin.com/in/baxweb/。虽然大部分的风险已经确定，但由于它是一个有条件的商业顶层，我相信你的团队应该强调可能来自美国当地政府的风险，以及当地和在线学习者的风险。例如，如果你的教员和学员之间的关系在信任方面更加密切，你的组织政策如何防止不良教员访问或获取学员的钱包信息（你列出的介绍性课程的一部分），如果发生这种事件，对学员的保证是什么。
f6_assessments.q1: 由于该团队具有教育和向目标受众提供培训的背景。风险分析和解决方案已经支持了这些。该团队最初在大学附近投资并装修了他们的办公室。大卫和他的团队已经确定，谁将接受培训，他们如何提供培训和培训结果的目的。对于每月20美元的在线远程学习者，团队应该比较你的课程与目前来自Cardano论坛https://cardano.stackexchange.com/ 和Project Catalyst等的课程有什么不同或更好。
f6_assessments.q2: 摘自提案："每个催化剂基金至少有1个提案获得资助，每个基金至少有10个提案被我们的成员总结"。我相信挑战团队很容易通过所提供的精确信息对项目进行审计。然而，可持续发展业务和在线/离线社区的利益是最终的。如果你的组织能够每月公布学习者的反馈，那么社区就可以监督并可能为你的培训项目带来更多的观众或学习者。

f6_assessments.q0: The team argues that there is a lot of misinformation about blockchain and that there are not many accessible ways to learn. Although this might be considered a generic hypothesis, I can understand that more options that are close to the average user and that seek to trigger curiosity while lowering the entry barrier strongly align with the objectives of this challenge. In the proposal, a Cafe is proposed that at the same time functions as a learning center on everything related to blockchain. The author of the proposal includes five success metrics all with a stated goal, all of which I believe are aligned with what this challenge seeks.
f6_assessments.q1: Based on this proposal, I believe that a great team with the necessary profiles was assembled, covering all the necessary backgrounds for a successful implementation. In addition, there are partnerships with organizations like Catalyst School, Gimbalabs, and the Arizona State University Blockchain Club, which in my opinion gives me more confidence that the implementation will go smoothly. I also consider that we could have links not only to the website and social networks but also to the professional profiles of the team members.I cannot make a precise assessment of the budget's suitability because of the local context, which I believe greatly influences it. Furthermore, I believe it is positive that the details of the budget include all the elements which my experience as a project manager with an engineering background (mostly consulting) allows me to consider. In this regard, I can affirm positively that the necessary preparations are being made to ensure a smooth implementation.
f6_assessments.q2: As for auditability, I must commend the team's description of the necessary milestones and timeline. I think they do a great job. Key metrics, such as wallet creation and the conversion rate of visitors to the learning center compared to those who register for classes, will enable the community to assess the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
"Creating a coffee shop and coffee cart is a great idea to get people interested in Cardano. Cardano classes are held in a room separated by transparent glass which can arouse people's curiosity about Cardano and blockchain.
In addition, the lessons are also streamed on online platforms, which helps the programs reach a wide variety of audiences both locally and around the world.

The idea of self-funding to run classes in the long term by selling coffee and collecting fees for intensive classes is a very sustainable way that the proposal can develop in many places in the future."
f6_assessments.q1:
"The team behind this proposal have different experiences suitable to perform different tasks of the proposal. In addition, the team also connects with Catalyst School to receive support for resources and knowledge for their seminars. These things make the proposal highly viable. In addition, the proposal also sets out achievable goals

I will rate 5 points for the proposal if the proposal provides personal information of the members and the things that the proposal has done before to verify all that the proposer show in this proposal is true."
f6_assessments.q2:
"This is a proposal that needs a lot of funding. Therefore, the proposal only wants to fund $50,000 in the total investment of the proposal of $450,000 to match the total amount of the challenge.

In addition, the proposal also sets out very specific numbers and goals that are achievable and verifiable."

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal deals with providing high quality information about Blockchain technology using a new approach. The solution provides a community learning center linked to a crypto cafe
There is clarity in the problem, the solution, and the relevance of these to the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The recommended group consists of 4 members, easily verifying their identity and experience provided by LinkedIn. All four members come from four different fields, I think this is amazing, they will complement each other's knowledge to suggest what is perfect.
It should be fairly easy to gauge the success of this proposal based on the information provided by the proponent. The proposal paints a perfect picture of how the proposal was successfully implemented. According to the presentation, the proposal could be in the works, have a clear business plan, an eye-catching and attractive website, and have a community behind its proposal. All can be easily checked.
The proponent details the potential challenges and risks and establishes a number of measures to overcome all of them.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal has a good roadmap with milestones that we can expect to track and see the development of each step. The KPI is pretty clear and its progress can be easily checked.
The stated budget is reasonable enough and it makes me completely agree that the team has enough capacity to tackle the challenge. The implementation of this proposal requires an extremely large amount of capital, but the proposed team only requires the amount of 56,400 USD with a reasonable explanation where the costs are used to establish and operate the learning center, and other costs related to the coffee shop business, they will raise capital from other sources. For the above reason shows the transparency and honesty of the proposal

f6_assessments.q0: I think this proposal is very well thought out and shows great strength in the work already put into action.  The value it can add to the Cardano system is clear, particularly with the system for training instructors of the classes.  The one area that I'd like to see more emphasis, in regards to meeting the challenge, is how this will reach users that are not already advantaged to recognize the power and possibilities of blockchain such as college students.
f6_assessments.q1: The detailed business plan for the coffee shop and the team assembled shows great momentum towards a larger project, that if successful would make the learning center (the part in which Catalyst funds are being requested) very likely to succeed.
f6_assessments.q2: The five metrics and goals provided give a good breadth of means by which the progress of this project can be observed.  I particularly like the metrics to gauge the success of the Incubator program and the fostering of more and more proposals to Catalyst.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal visualises also my idea of community hubs of Cardano- Cardano embassies. The idea of the coffee shop and learning centre could be sustainable in future. The author of the proposal is also interested in "franchise" in the future all around the world and if that will go through those embassies could take over in many places.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has clear steps and a vision on what to do and how to achieve the main objective also with measurable key business objectives. A business plan is also prepared that is a big investment in future success.
f6_assessments.q2: Proposer gave sufficient information(plans, steps, necessary funding) regarding how he and his team will achieve their main goal. They have also added a detailed Business plan.

solution: 提供一个社区学习中心，附属于一个加密的积极咖啡店，提供涵盖广泛主题的演示和课程。
experience: 我是一名前端工程师，过去曾是一名咖啡师。我一直被Cardano社区的热情所鼓舞
